restructureit.refactorings.processors

Class PushDownMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • spoon.processing.AbstractProcessor<spoon.reflect.declaration.CtMethod<?>>
      • restructureit.refactorings.processors.PushDownMethod
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    spoon.processing.FactoryAccessor, spoon.processing.Processor<spoon.reflect.declaration.CtMethod<?>>

    public class PushDownMethod
extends spoon.processing.AbstractProcessor<spoon.reflect.declaration.CtMethod<?>>
    Performs the refactoring Push down method. It moves a method down to the subclasses that use it. Reference: https://www.refactoring.com/catalog/pushDownMethod.html

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<spoon.reflect.declaration.CtClass<?>> classesUsingMethod
      List containing all classes that use this particular method.
      private static int timesApplied
      Total number of times the push down refactoring was performed.
      private double toleranceLevel
      Tolerance level which indicates what percentage of subclasses should use the method for it to be considered for moving up.

      PushDownMethod()
